channel.title: Comments on: Graph Processing versus Graph Databases

item.title: By: Patrick Barker
item.dc:creator: Patrick Barker
item.description: This article is super useful, I have been searching around for days trying to distinguish all these technologies. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: This article is super useful, I have been searching around for days trying to distinguish all these technologies. Thanks!

item.title: By: Graph Processing: Calculating betweenness centrality for an undirected graph using graphstream at Mark Needham
item.dc:creator: Graph Processing: Calculating betweenness centrality for an undirected graph using graphstream at Mark Needham
item.description: [...] most of my time surrounded by graphs I thought it’d be interesting to learn a bit more about graph processing, a topic my colleague Jim wrote about a couple of years [...]

item.title: By: J Santis
item.dc:creator: J Santis
item.description:
I wonder if we would implement a classic application such as an accounting, Medical Record, flight forecasting or other classic applications with Neo4j as back-end, keeping a fast query system, and easy and fast OLAP.
Cheers, J.S.
item.content:encoded:
I wonder if we would implement a classic application such as an accounting, Medical Record, flight forecasting or other classic applications with Neo4j as back-end, keeping a fast query system, and easy and fast OLAP.

Cheers,
J.S.
